name: serbet-blockchain-lambda
description: A Lambda function to execute transactions against Amazon Managed Blockchain

scripts.build: cd ../ && rm -r $npm_package_name.zip && sam build && cd .aws-sam/build/$npm_package_lambdaFunction && zip -r ../../../$npm_package_name.zip *
scripts.run:
cd ../ && sam build && clear && sam local invoke -e events/event.json $npm_package_lambdaFunction --log-file logfile.txt &&  tr '' '
' <logfile.txt && cat logfile.txt
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd ../ && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name $npm_package_awsLambdaName --zip-file fileb://$npm_package_name.zip
